comment.author: 49793900@N00
comment._content: Is it Sylvia or Emmeline? (and it's 'Trafalgar', 'London', and 'England').

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: If the photos is indeed from 1932, that's Sylvia (1882-1960) -- Emmeline Pankhurst died in 1928. Also in 1932, Sylvia Pankhurst organized the Socialist Workers' National Health Council, and published The Home Front. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sylvia_Pankhurst
